issue.title: [C++] Dataset tests not built on Windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7650](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7650). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
They are explicitly disabled in `cpp/src/arrow/dataset/CMakeLists.txt`. Also, if re-enable them, there are many compile errors (on VS 2017).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7650?focusedCommentId=17021988) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6260
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6260>
